press_oven_button.description: Press the button to turn on the oven.

clean_oven_button.description: Clean the button to ensure it is free from dirt and debris.

press_button.description: Press the button of the oven.

close_oven_door.description: Close the oven's door by swinging it on its hinge to the closed position.

clean_opened_door.description: Clean the opened door to ensure it is free from dirt and debris.

close_door.description: Close the oven door by swinging it on its hinge to the closed position.

open_oven_door.description: Open the oven's door by swinging it on its hinge.

clean_closed_door.description: Clean the closed door to ensure it is free from dirt and debris.

open_door.description: Open the oven door by swinging it on its hinge to the open position.

clean_oven_body.description: Clean the oven body to remove dirt and debris.

clean_whole_oven.description: Clean the whole oven including oven body, door, and button.

oven_maintenance.description: Complete the oven maintenance process by carefully cleaning all the parts and then pressing the button.

clean_oven.description: Clean the oven to remove food residuals.

clean_door.description: Clean both the opened and closed door to ensure cleanliness.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure it functions properly.
